body_html:
I do think that there were other issues introduced specifically by model_to_estimator, and hopefully those (at least the ones related to batch_norm) are resolved by @tanzhenyu's fix.

Additionally, we are certainly inheriting the issues mentioned there, and we should fix them. So if there are open issues on TF related to finetuning and batchnorm, we should close them with a fix once we have one.
body_text:

Additionally, we are certainly inheriting the issues mentioned there, and we should fix them. So if there are open issues on TF related to finetuning and batchnorm, we should close them with a fix once we have one.
body:
I do think that there were other issues introduced specifically by model_to_estimator, and hopefully those (at least the ones related to batch_norm) are resolved by @tanzhenyu's fix. 

Additionally, we are certainly inheriting the issues mentioned there, and we should fix them. So if there are open issues on TF related to finetuning and batchnorm, we should close them with a fix once we have one.
